text: Receiving the Meritus Scholarship for Academic Excellence is truly an honor for me. My journey through the first year has been transformational. Academic rigor, the structured curriculum and case-based discussions really push me to think deeper and sharpen my analytical abilities. A big part of this achievement goes to our exceptional faculty. This, their guidance, real guidance and constant encouragement help me connect the theory with practice in every course.
